resources.string: Permission to camera is not granted
An unexpected error occurred while taking the photo.
The camera is in use. Please, close other apps, which uses the camera.
All the cameras are in use. Please, close other apps, which uses the cameras.
Camera is disabled. Please, enable system camera in the device settings and reopen the app.
Fatal error is occurred. Please, reboot the device to restore camera function.
Do not disturb mode enabled. Please, disable the "Do Not Disturb" mode, then reopen the camera
Permission to camera is not granted
Previously you denied permission to access camera, so the photos can\'t be made. You could grant this permission in Application Settings.
Photos can\'t be made until permission to camera is granted. Would you like to grant the permission?
Permission to external storage is not granted
Previously you denied permission to write into external storage, so the photo can\'t be save. You could grant this permission in Application Settings.
Permission to write into external storage is required
The photo can\'t be saved until permission to write into external storage is granted. Would you like to grant the permission?
